question: 浴槽
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>tank</kanji> you <kanji>bathe</kanji> in is a <vocabulary>bathtub</vocabulary>. Unless you're bathing in like... the town's water supply. If you are, please stop. I don't want to drink your bathwater.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
